actions.name: Interstellar Shift
actions.description:
Effect: The user freely Moves up to 4m of a Movement Type of its choice and chance Forme. Depending on its Forme, it gains another Ability.

- Normal Forme - Pressure

- Attack Forme - Mold Breaker

- Speed Forme - Speed Boost

- Defense Forme - Sturdy
